text: " next week i hope my duties will afford me a little liberty , and i will take advantage of it to come and put things in order here , as they must necessarily be much deranged . "
and , on this reply , it was decided that a vessel should be constructed in time to be launched towards the month of next october , on the return of the fine season .
" yes , pencroft , and if the next crop gives a proportionate yield , we shall have four thousand bushels . "
the severe cold began to be felt about the 20th of june , and , to his great regret , pencroft was obliged to suspend his boat - building , which he hoped to finish in time for next spring .
do not depend upon me , madame , for the next meeting . since my convalescence i have so many affairs of this kind on my hands that i am forced to regulate them a little .
those which the settlers wore had passed this winter , but they would not last until next winter .
a deserted camp , the ashes of a fire , would put us on the track , and this is what we will look for in our next expedition . "
adieu , dear sister , till your next swoon ! "

and milady went to bed and fell asleep with a smile upon her lips . anyone who had seen her sleeping might have said she was a young girl dreaming of the crown of flowers she was to wear on her brow at the next festival .
